title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain a mixture of tabs and spaces, nothing happens.
EB: After executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain a mixture of tabs and spaces, the lines should be indented by one tab or a set number of spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a default text editor. 
2. Type in the following on separate lines: a space, some tabs, some text, some tabs, some text2. 
3. Highlight the two lines above. 
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command. 
5. Observe that nothing happens to the lines.
